name: @saga-ed/infra-compose
description: Composable Docker service templates for Saga platform local development

scripts.prepublishOnly: export CODEARTIFACT_AUTH_TOKEN=$(aws codeartifact get-authorization-token --domain saga --domain-owner 531314149529 --query authorizationToken --output text) && npm config set //saga-531314149529.d.codeartifact.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/npm/saga_js/:_authToken=$CODEARTIFACT_AUTH_TOKEN && echo 'âœ… CodeArtifact auth token refreshed'
